'Here you go, Sho. Say ahh!'%K%P
'Ahh. *Munch*'%K%P
I chewed on the piece of omelet Maika offered\nme.%K%P
'What do you think? I tried changing the recipe\na little this time.'%K%P
'Mmm, it's good.'%K%P
'Yay! Okay, try some of this salmon next.'%K%P
'Mmm... This is great, not too salty. Of course,\neverything tastes good when you make it.'%K%P
'Oh, Sho, you charmer!'%K%P
Seeing Maika blush and smile like that, I was\nready to take on anything.%K%P
'Are these two for real?'%K%P
'They've just started going out, it's natural\nfor them to be like this at first.'%K%P
'Well, as long as they're happy, I guess.'%K%P
'But what about us? I don't know where to look\nhere.'%K%P
'Sho, you've got a grain of rice... Here, let me\nget it for you.'%K%P
'Oh, thank you, Maika.'%K%P
'No need to thank me. I am your girlfriend,\nright?'%K%P
'I had no idea couples like this really\nexisted.'%K%P
'I think it's lovely that they're so\naffectionate.'%K%P
Akane and Inori were saying...something, but I\nwasn't really paying attention.%K%P
I was in heaven.%K%P
'Sho?'%K%P
'Yeah?'%K%P
'I just like saying your name. Heehee.'%K%P
'Ha, I know what you mean. Maika.'%K%P
'Sho.'%K%P
'Maika.'%K%P
'So, Inori... This rice is kinda sweet today,\nhuh?'%K%P
'Oh, yes, indeed. The tea, too. I wonder if\nthere's more sugar in it than usual.'%K%P
Was it just me, or did those two seem a little\nuncomfortable?%K%P
'What's wrong, guys? Is something wrong with the\nfood?'%K%P
'Is it because of the changes I made? Is it too\nsweet?'%K%P
She'd changed it to suit my tastes, after all.%K%P
Maybe that was it. Akane and Inori just weren't\nused to this new flavor yet.%K%P
'No, no. I've got no complaints about the food.\nRight, Inori?'%K%P
'Right. It's delicious. There's certainly\nnothing wrong with the food.'%K%P
'So what's up?'%K%P
'I can't believe they haven't noticed. How long\nis this gonna last?'%K%P
'Don't get me wrong, I'm very happy for them...\nBut having to watch them like this may become a\nlittle tiring...'%K%P
Maika and I looked at the two goddesses,\ncompletely dumbfounded.%K%P
'I think maybe I'll go out somewhere today. The\nair in this place is too much for me.'%K%P
'I agree. Let's allow these two some time\nalone.'%K%P
'Okay, we'll be going then, bye!'%K%P
'Oh, all right. Take care.'%K%P
'Sure, if you say so.'%K%P
Apparently Maika and I would have the house to\nourselves this afternoon.%K%P
This was going to be great.%K%P
After seeing off the two goddesses, we decided\nto tackle the remaining housework.%K%P
'Okay, that should do it.'%K%P
I finished up cleaning the corridors, and\nrealized my breathing had gotten heavy.%K%P
Tsubaki was pretty big, after all. I worked up\nquite a sweat doing a full circuit of the place.%K%P
'I should take a bath before getting back to\nMaika.'%K%P
I didn't want to subject her to my company while\nI was still so sweaty.%K%P
I returned to my room, threw off most of my\nclothes and headed for the bathroom.%K%P
'A whole afternoon with Maika...'%K%P
The housework was done and Akane and Inori\nwouldn't be back for a while. Hanging out with\nMaika would be a fun way to spend the day.%K%P
'Gotta clean myself off first, though.'%K%P
Still partly in a daze, I swung open the door to\nthe bathroom.%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
'Ah.'%K%P
Maika was already inside, in the process of\ngetting undressed and now in only her underwear.%K%P
'Sh-Sho...?'%K%P
'Uh, wow, uh... This door wasn't locked, was\nit?'%K%P
I did have to turn the doorknob a few times, but\nit had opened easily enough.%K%P
For a moment neither of us said a word.%K%P
In my head I knew I should look away and close\nthe door, but Maika's body captured my\nattention.%K%P
'Hey...'%K%P
'Yeah?'%K%P
'Wh-Why are you trying to get in here?!'%K%P
'Oh!'%K%P
Maika was starting to get flustered.%K%P
'No way, I forgot to lock it?! I-I just didn't\nwant to come see you while I was still sweaty\nand, and--'%K%P
'You know that wouldn't bother me, right?'%K%P
'That's not the point!'%K%P
'How long are you gonna keep staring?!'%K%P
'Oh, sorry! You just look so beautiful...!'%K%P
For some reason that calmed Maika down.%K%P
'Y-You really think I look good...? You like my\nbody, Sho?'%K%P
'Of course I do...'%K%P
Aw, crud!%K%P
I just sort of answered on reflex!%K%P
But rather than getting mad, Maika seemed to\ntake it as a compliment.%K%P
'Heh, really now? Perhaps you'd like to look a\nlittle more, then?'%K%P
'If...you insist...'%K%P
Since I had permission now, I let my eyes wander\nall over Maika's body.%K%P
All the way along her slender arms, across her\nwell-endowed chest and back down the curves of\nher hips...%K%P
She looked good from every angle.%K%P
And this was the girl I was going out with. I\nmust be the luckiest guy in the world.%K%P
'Y-You know... Being stared at like this... I\ndon't think I can...'%K%P
Maika shifted and fidgeted, her face going\nredder by the moment.%K%P
'Something wrong?'%K%P
'Sorry! I'll go now!'%K%P
It would be bad to keep going as it is so I\nturned back.%K%P
